content.description: Automated secret rotation workflow for infrastructure/production hardening.
steps: Store secrets in centralized vault (AWS Secrets Manager, GCP Secret Manager, Vault) with rotation lambda/cloud function.
Emit rotation events (secret_id, version, rotated_at) to event bus for dependent services.
Services consume rotation topic, reload configuration without restart, and acknowledge success.
If acknowledgement fails within SLA, automatically open incident with on-call and fallback to previous version.
content.slo: Rotation completed within 15 minutes, zero failed acknowledgements.
